md:
giải nghĩa từ "energy" sang tiếng việt; đưa ra nghĩa tiếng việt theo từ loại và đưa ra câu ví dụ, các từ liên quan.

1. Energy (noun)
	* Meaning: năng lượng, sức mạnh
	* Example: The energy of the sun is harnessed to generate electricity.
	* Related words: kinetic energy, potential energy, thermal energy, nuclear energy
2. Energy (verb)
	* Meaning: cung cấp năng lượng, kích thích
	* Example: The coffee energized me and I was able to finish my project on time.
	* Related words: energize, energizing, energetic

Note: Depending on the context, "energy" can have different meanings and connotations. In physics, it refers to the ability to do work, while in everyday language, it can refer to vitality, enthusiasm, or motivation.
